articles.description: Get your bags and wallets at the ready
articles.content:
Whether it's retail therapy or getting the bare essentials, shopping is a huge part of our lives. As a big city, we've done a lot of it, too. 
 Today, you can have almost anything you need delivered… [+2055 chars]
